thread.title: Amy Adams wants to join Jennifer Lawrence, Amy Schumer’s boat party
thread.title_full: Amy Adams wants to join Jennifer Lawrence, Amy Schumer’s boat party

author: Wires English | Indo-Asian News Service
title: Amy Adams wants to join Jennifer Lawrence, Amy Schumer’s boat party
text:
Amy Adams wants to join Jennifer Lawrence, Amy Schumer’s boat party By Indo-Asian News Service on October 22, 2015 at 3:45 AM Comments Los Angeles, Oct 22 (IANS) Actress Amy Adams says she would love to join Jennifer Lawrence and Amy Schumer on their next boat party. ”I’m waiting for Jennifer Lawrence and Amy Schumer to invite me to their party!” the actress told hollywoodreporter.com. ”So, I hope I was funny today so they will invite me to their next boating party! Also Read: Oscar Awards 2014: Amy Adams, Sandra Bullock, Kate Hudson are the Best Dressed Celebs! “I’m a little more neurotic than both of them, but I think that would be – they need a little of that, and they’re both so cool and I could be the ‘not-cool’ person,” she added. Lawrence and Schumer became fast friends after they went jet skiing together in Hamptons earlier this year. 
  3:09 AM Topics:
